QuestionJSON.Question: Darby is an intern at a multinational organization. Their task is to create a program that finds out the best time zone for an online meeting where attendees are located in different parts of the world. As the first step, what is the subproblem that Darby should solve?
QuestionJSON.Answer1: Making a count of how many countries each employee is from
QuestionJSON.Answer2: Finding out the most spoken languages in the company
QuestionJSON.Answer3: Finding out the current time in each city where attendees are located
QuestionJSON.Answer4: Writing a program to automatically send meeting invites
QuestionJSON.Explanation: While all of these could be part of a larger program, in this context, the most helpful subproblem to solve first would be finding the current time in each city where attendees are located. This step is necessary before Darby can determine the best meeting time.
